resources.string: Let other player to scan to join in

Your task is to move the red car from current place to the exit of the market\'s parking lot. To do this, you need to move other cars. The car placed vertically should be moved in vertical and the car placed horizontally should be moved in horizontal. You can tap the car and swipe your finger to move the car, and if your way is blocked by other cars, we will not be able to move your car anymore. The time you cost and the step you make are counted for the star you get in a mission.
